name: Bitcoin's Fairy Mascot
description: “$PIXIE is the original Bitcoin Fairy mascot brought to life on Solana. First hidden on Bitcoin.org since 2009, Pixie represents one of the earliest and most authentic memes in crypto history. This project is fully community-driven and built with transparency, with supply locks, open communication, and a clear roadmap. The goal is to grow $PIXIE into the billions by combining strong branding, continuous marketing, and community power — not just as a meme, but as a long-term movement.”
